about_the_game:
There is chaos in Shiyuba, also referred to as Area 01. After many investigations in this area, a large source of Aurorium has been found (a rare useful material). As a result, part of Shiyuba has now been cordoned off to allow everything to be excavated. After many intense runs, almost the entire population of the city and surrounding area was evacuated. Three groups remain: Bandits; workers at Nexcorp (the largest Aurorium company in the world) and Dissenters, a group that fights against NexCorp and anyone who stands in their way.

SCAVENGE



Explore, collect, and create an array of diverse items and progress through tiers of loot. Uncover weaponry, tools, consumables, medical supplies, military equipment, electronics, or even make your own hideout! This and an extensive array of other essentials for survival.

MAP




Discover the colorful world of shiyuba, explore abandoned POI's, mysterious villages and climb the peaks of the highest mountains

SURVIVE



Try to survive in this danger zone. Fight away the danger with your friends or on your own. Be careful! Through an innovative health system that realistically simulates the human body. Any injury disrupts your senses and abilities. Recognizing and treating injuries is essential for survival.

TRADE




Fear not, there is a safe zone for all players in this place of chaos. At the center, you can make allies, trade with advanced NPCs and accept missions.

UPGRADE



Upgrade your characters by gaining experience points by completing missions, chasing away enemies and extracting.

EXTRACT



Shiyuba is almost completely surrounded by a barrier called The border area. You can either choose to fight off all the opponents in the area or take your chances by fleeing the land. Be careful, there are a lot of NPC's securing the place even in the sky.

  • OS: Windows® 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-8600 | AMD Ryzen™ 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060 8GB | NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1080 8GB | 2060 SUPER 8GB RTX 4060 8GB | AMD Radeon™ RX 5700 8GB | RX 6600 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 45 GB available space

short_description: NO MAN'S AREA is a gripping and hardcore FPS experience. Enlist with the rebel group, Dissenters, and traverse vibrant terrains. Combat both human and AI adversaries, striving to rescue Shiyuba while mastering survival tactics.
